tasks.__task: ensure web server ports are open

results.msg: Permanent and Non-Permanent(immediate) operation, Changed service http to enabled
Permanent and Non-Permanent(immediate) operation, Changed service https to enabled

tasks.task: ensure web server ports are open

res.msg:
Unable to restart service httpd: Job for httpd.service failed because the control process exited with error code.
See "systemctl status httpd.service" and "journalctl -xe" for details.
